thread.title: New England Is Not Done Getting Its Deflategate Revenge
thread.title_full: New England Is Not Done Getting Its Deflategate Revenge - WSJ

author: Andrew Beaton
title: New England Is Not Done Getting Its Deflategate Revenge
text:
To New England, Tom Brady’s four-game Deflategate suspension is the NFL’s gift that keeps on giving. A rested, vengeful Brady returned and led New England to a title. Now the team has a chance to cash in on one of the suspension’s unintended side effects this offseason.

The Brady sabbatical gave Jimmy Garoppolo a platform to show his abilities beyond holding a clipboard. The young quarterback shined in two September starts and is now... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
